pullRequest.title: Rationalize some ThreadPool Use in Snapshot Transport Actions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removing a few spots where we clearly don't have to fork to the generic or management
pool since either we only interpret the current cluster state or fork-off directly to
some other pool in the transport action logic anyway.

commit.message:
Rationalize some ThreadPool Use in Snapshot Transport Actions

Removing a few spots where we clearly don't have to fork to the generic or management
pool since either we only interpret the current cluster state or fork-off directly to
some other pool in the transport action logic anyway.

nodes.bodyText: First step of creating a snapshot nowadays is putting the init state snapshot in the CS => forking to the CS thread right away anyway
Forks straight to the snapshot thread under the hood
Only looks at the CS and that's it.
getMultipleReposSnapshotInfo forks to the generic pool for every individual repo in the response, no need to fork setting up the task for each repo.
